# Ani-Charades GitHub Pages Deployment

This repository is configured for GitHub Pages deployment.

## Live Demo
Once deployed, your game will be available at:
`https://mechworrior.github.io/Ani-charades/`

## Deployment Steps

### First Time Setup:
1. Commit all files to your repository
2. Push to GitHub
3. Go to repository Settings â†’ Pages
4. Under "Source", select your branch (main/master)
5. Select "/ (root)" as the folder
6. Click Save
7. Wait 1-2 minutes for deployment

### Your game will be live!
- Main game: `https://mechworrior.github.io/Ani-charades/`
- Admin panel: `https://mechworrior.github.io/Ani-charades/admin.html`

## Local Development
Simply open `index.html` in your browser - no server needed!

## Updating the Live Site
Just commit and push changes - GitHub Pages auto-deploys!
